hints.content: To subtract on the number line, we start at $88$ and move **left** $\purpleD{40}$ and then $\maroonD{5}$ more.

This number line shows $88 - 45$:

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 48, and 88. From 88 an arrow goes to 48 with the label minus 40 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 48 to question mark with the label minus 5 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c53e80a034bd75421f0feb43966078cfa8091538)

choices.content: ![A number line has points labeled question mark, 38, and 88. From 88 an arrow goes to 38 with the label minus 50 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 38 to question mark with the label minus 4 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3870f7c7250d9c64c51af60208bcdf84631e2078)

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 84, and 88. From 88 an arrow goes to 84 with the label minus 4 above the arrow. Another arrow goes from 84 to question mark with the label minus 5 above the arrow.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/15039ca0468e64e3fca4042687e74fb406f05c5b)

![A number line has points labeled question mark, 48, and 88. From 88 an arrow goes to 48 with the label minus 40 above the arrow.
